channel.title: Weird Utensils on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Weird Utensils on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Let's Talk About Forks, Baby
item.description: Utensils are the great equalizer. “I once saw a forklift lift a crate of forks, and it was way too literal for me,” late philosopher and one-liner king Mitch Hedberg apparently once said. It may be the deepest thing ever said about forks. That’s because we generally don’t talk about forks very often, or utensils in general, really. That’s despite their extreme prevalence. Everyone has to use a utensil at some point in their lives, whether they’re sporks, forks, spoons, or chopsticks.
